title: Handlettering Needed
content:
Hello,  
Wondering if any of your can recommend a hand lettering genius to help us create a signature logotype. Was trying to work with Ale Paul from Sudtipos in Argentina, but he's about to go on vacation. That's the kind of person I am looking for (i.e. in terms of the kinds of lettering he does).

Any recommendations would be greatly appreciated.

We are in San Francisco, but they/you/whoever doesn't have to be local.

Thanks,  
Peter.
